Package ch.colabproject.colab.api.ejb

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationLifecycleFacade
    Some business method required by ApplicationLifecycleFacade.
    CardFacade
    Card, card def and card content specific logic
    CdiBridgeSingleton
    Single which give access to the CDI world.
    ProjectFacade
    Some project logic
    RequestManager
    Request sidekick.
    SecurityFacade
    To check access rights.
    SubscriptionRequest
    Subscription request to be propagated through the cluster to reach the instance which is responsible for the given wsSessionId
    TokenFacade
    Process tokens
    TransactionManager
    Transaction sidekick.
    UserManagement
    Everything related to user management
    WebsocketFacade
    Some methods to handle websocket connections.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SubscriptionRequest.ChannelType
    One-to-one mapping to EffectiveChannels
    SubscriptionRequest.SubscriptionType
    Subscript or unsubscribe
